inputInfo.description: The dataset url on S3, to perform prediction on
inputInfo.label: Dataset url on S3

outputInfo.description: S3 url of the predictions file
outputInfo.label: Predictions S3 url

arguments.label: Model input file
arguments.description: Model file path in local file system

arguments.label: Model filepath on S3
arguments.description: The model filepath on S3. Its root is the bucket. If it ends with '/' the uploaded basename will be concatenated

arguments.label: Results S3 location
arguments.description: The Amazon S3 path where you want Amazon SageMaker to store the results of the transform job (refer to: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/latest/dg/API_TransformOutput.html#SageMaker-Type-TransformOutput-S3OutputPath)

arguments.label: Skip model upload (Test)
arguments.description: If true, then assume the model was already uploaded and exists under 'model_s3_url'
